typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as integer,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as short,
		Rating as short,
		{Rotton Tomato} as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 select(mapColumn(
		MOVIE_ID = movie,
		MOVIE_TITLE = title,
		GENRE = genres,
		YEAR = year,
		RATING = Rating,
		{ROTTEN TOMATO} = {Rotton Tomato}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 filter(toInteger(YEAR) > 1950) ~> Filter1
Filter1 derive(PRIMARY_GENRE = iif(locate("|",GENRE) > 1,left(GENRE, locate("|",GENRE)-1),GENRE)) ~> SplittingMovieGenres
SplittingMovieGenres window(over(PRIMARY_GENRE,
		YEAR),
	asc({ROTTEN TOMATO}, true),
	RatingsRank = rank()) ~> RankMoviesByRatings
RankMoviesByRatings aggregate(groupBy(PRIMARY_GENRE,
		YEAR),
	AverageRating = avg(toInteger({ROTTEN TOMATO})),
		{Highest Rated} = first(MOVIE_TITLE),
		LowestRated = last(MOVIE_TITLE),
		NumberOfMovies = count()) ~> AggregateRatings
AggregateRatings sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	mapColumn(
		PrimaryGenre = PRIMARY_GENRE,
		YearOfRelease = YEAR_OF_RELEASE,
		AverageRating,
		HighestRated = {Highest Rated},
		LowestRated,
		NumberOfMovies
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
